Package javelin.model.world.location.fortification

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Academy
    A place where units can go to learn about a general topic - be it physical feats or intellectual or magical prowess.
    Dwelling
    Allows a player to recruit one type of unit.
    Fortification
    A guarded place is a world feature that has a garrison army since the bieggining of the game.
    Guardian
    Single creature that guards an Item.
    Inn
    Allows a Squad to rest outside of a Town.
    MagesGuild
    The only place a Combatant can learn new spells.
    MartialAcademy
    Allows a player to learn one upgrade set.
    Mine
    Found only on Mountains, mines allow a Squad to mine gold over a period of time or leave Combatants there for long-term mining - in which case the resulting gold needs to be gathered there by a Squad later on.
    Shrine
    Will cast Rituals (certain Spells) for gold.
    Trove
    Represents all the resource types found in the game: gold, experience, keys, labor and rubies.
